Class BigDecimalUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.luisa.miniwrangler.java.validation.utils.BigDecimalUtils
  • public class BigDecimalUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to validate big decimals and build messages describing the errors (if any)
    Author:
    Luisa Pinto

      • checkMinValue

        public static java.lang.String checkMinValue​(java.lang.String field,
                                             java.math.BigDecimal d,
                                             java.math.BigDecimal min)
        Check whether the given BigDecimal is less or equal than the given min
        Parameters:
        field - the name of the field for which the value is d
        d - the given big decimal
        min - the given minimum
        Returns:
        an empty string is the check has passed, or a message describing the error
